name: Superman Returns: The Videogame
description:
Explore and protect the truly living city of Metropolis - one that is not only expansive (with 80 sq miles and over 10,000 buildings), but also changes dynamically with you as you affect gameplay.

Features

  • Authentic Action and Epic Battles - Master twenty-five monumental challenges and Epic Battles against super villains including Mongul, Brainiac, Parasite, Bizarro, and Metallo.
  • Superman Returns Mode - Thwart an old enemy's plot that has disastrous consequences for Metropolis and takes Superman from the depths of the ocean to the far reaches of outer space.
  • Battle of the Ages Mode - Avoid Mxyzptlk's 5th Dimension tricks to be the last Superman standing while playing as your all-time favorite Superman including the original 'Golden Age' character created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster in 1938.
  • Action Comics Mode - Replay completed challenges to beat your friends' best times, and play single challenges against friends who do not own the game card.
